txt.en: 'Meow! You know sometimes I dream that I'm something called a \qSystems Designer\q and that I make jokes about Sauron destroying things. Isn't that strange?\n\nYou probably don't care about that though, you just want me to complete Book VIII of the Epic. Well speak to me again and I shall do so!
Tens yawns.\n'Hrm? Oh yes, you can complete the quest now.'
Completion of this quest will flag your character has having completed all the quests in Book VIII of the Epic quest series.
